item.title: Prime Checker
item.description: 3 different ways to check if a number is prime. I came up with three different algorithms for determining whether a number is prime, each of which is therefore coded differently: Exclude n if it is less than 2. Now, find its square root, then use a for loop in the range between 2 and that square root plus 1. If there is no number in the loop that is divisible by n, then n is prime.
